### Reproducibility

All scripts used to prepare data and build models are available at https://github.com/fabianaiolfi/MA_Thesis.  

Data files are available for download here: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/xc8fuhn17vfjf6h29hltu/ma_thesis_data.zip?rlkey=07u5yjvbe8hecztn68ml1ep12&dl=0


### Use of Artificial Intelligence

OpenAI's ChatGPT 4^[https://openai.com/chatgpt, retrieved 6 February 2024] was used in a supporting manner to copy edit text and develop R scripts. Prompts can be made available upon request.
